posts.post_content: If anyone has one of these available, please let me know.  Thanks.
Gary-  You had me all excited for a second.  I've been looking for one of these for some time now to pair with my ribbon.  Jeremy

Jeremy-It's another one of those needle in a haystack things.  My interest is in the mention of Ross Barnes in the text.  I think we both may be out of luck, but you never know.  Maybe we'll find two:).  I guess I should have put this in the memorabilia section in retrospect.

[quote name="GaryPassamonte" post=1915832]Jeremy-It's another one of those needle in a haystack things.  My interest is in the mention of Ross Barnes in the text.  I think we both may be out of luck, but you never know.  Maybe we'll find two:).  I guess I should have put this in the memorabilia section in retrospect.[/QUOTE

I think you have it in the right spot.  I hope someone responds & if you pass on the deal, please let me know.  Good luck.
